message:
I am learning TPL, perpetually, it seems. I have done some testing with your code (excellent article, Stephen, as always!) and it seems that the LogicalSet/GetData flows down to child tasks and not up or between sibling tasks. That is, if I comment out the line "using (MyStack.Push("Main"))" the data works within each SomeWork task ("1" and "2") and their child tasks but not between them.

Is there a way to pass data between sibling tasks and/or their parent tasks?
